column1: Source: USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference 28 slightly revised May 2016 Software v.3.7 2017-02-01
Nutrient data for: 19919, Candies, fruit snacks, with high vitamin C
(a)"Some candies contain added Vitamin E. If vitamin E is added at 25% DV per serving then Vitamin E= 8.4mg/100gm.
